Best Answer - Chosen by Asker I am a student and have worked at McDonalds for two and a half years. The location I work at is extremely flexible, and will give you the number of hours that you are looking for. If you end up applying for a job you will write on the application if you are applying for the front or in the kitchen. I would suggest working at McDonalds if you need flexible hours, and if you are a people person.
